thread.title: On Managing Sudden Wealth

author: wsjcom
title: On Managing Sudden Wealth
text:
Jenny Martella • Director of financial planning at Keatley Wealth Management, Charlotte, N.C. • Education: B.S., Lehigh University; M.B.A., George Washington University • Professional designations: Certified Financial Planner
Background: After Ms. Martella finished college, her father surprised her by gifting her some mutual funds, telling her she could either sell the funds and use the money to pay off her student loans, or pay down the loans herself, keep the mutual funds and watch them grow. She chose the latter and... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
